name: Michael DRAWBAUGH, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Court of York County, the Honorable Michael E. Bortner, Respondents

parties: Michael DRAWBAUGH, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Court of York County, the Honorable Michael E. Bortner, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 5th day of October, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are GRANTED. The court of common pleas is DIRECTED to adjudicate Petitioner’s pending filing within 90 days. The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 774
Michael DRAWBAUGH, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Court of York County, the Honorable Michael E. Bortner, Respondents.
No. 116 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 5, 2015.
